data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ordu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ordu, Turkey
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 274 believers in Ordu to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Ordu prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 274 believers in the state of Ordu to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turkmen people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turkmen people.
There are 731,500 people living in the state of Ordu. Only about 274 might be believers.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 731,500 people living in Ordu through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ordu, Turkey has a population of 731,500.

We estimate Ordu has 274 people who might know Jesus, 4,095 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 727,130 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,669 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ordu, Turkey. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
